name: Paint by Pixel 3
description:
Create beautiful pictures with Paint by Pixel 3! Unleash your creativity across 95 new levels of pixel art challenges! A perfect game to explore your artistic talent!



Choose from a wide range of beautiful art where each level is a unique canvas for your imagination. Paint by Pixel 3 is a different approach to pixel art and it is a perfect game to relax and unwind.



This fun game provides helpful features like autofill and hints to make your artistic journey smoother.

Features

  • Choose from 95 beautiful works of art!
  • Pick and play any level!
  • Customizable colors!
  • Beautiful soundtrack!
  • Zoom and magnify for easy play!

Explore the endless possibilities of pixel art and bring your artistic vision to life, one level at a time!
